caption.title: Structure of RVFV NSs-ΔNΔC.
caption.p: The helical arrangement of NSs shows a novel fold, comprised mainly of eight α-helices. The protein chain is colored in a rainbow spectrum from the N-terminus to the C-terminus. At the bottom, secondary structure elements are matched with the sequence of NSs-ΔNΔC (residues 83–248 of NSs). Numbered cylinders represent α-helices; narrower cylinders represent 3 10 helices. Residues 244–248 are not defined in the crystal structure.

caption.title: Asymmetric unit formed by two NSs molecules (colors as in Figure 2).
caption.p: The bottom image shows the asymmetric unit in the context of the interface between F1 and F2 fibrils.
